clinical_study.brief_title: Skin Aging in Renal Transplant Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Skin Aging in Renal Transplant Patients

brief_summary.textblock:
Determination of collagen, pigment and haemoglobin content of sun exposed and sun protected skin by Siascopy. Immunocompromised patients (for more than seven years) compared to immunocompetent patients.
- Trial in the field of transplantation / xenotransplantation

detailed_description.textblock: Determination of collagen, pigment and haemoglobin content of sun exposed and sun protected skin by Siascopy. Immunocompromised patients (for more than seven years) compared to immunocompetent patients.

primary_outcome.measure: skin aging defined by melanin, collagen and hemoglobin content
primary_outcome.time_frame: One Time measurement at the one and only time point of inclusion and measurement
primary_outcome.description: there is only one time point for measurement, there is no "time frame", just one single measurement per patient at the one and only visit

intervention.intervention_name: Photosensitivity under the influence of immunocomp

study_pop.textblock: individuals between 18 and 90 years of age

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
- Renal transplant recipients transplanted more than seven years ago and immunocompetent probands of the same age.
Exclusion criteria:
- Refusal of informed consent, physical or psychological inability to give informed consent.
